faq.question: How do I get the 50% nonprofit discount?
faq.answer: Email us proof of your 501(c)(3) status (IRS determination letter) and we'll apply 50% off any paid plan. We're committed to supporting nonprofits.

faq.question: What's included in the free plan?
faq.answer: Free plan includes 100 pages/month - perfect for small nonprofits just starting. With the 50% discount, Starter is only $4.50/mo and Pro is $9.50/mo.

faq.question: Can our whole team use it?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The Team plan (normally $49/mo, $24.50 with nonprofit discount) includes unlimited users. Perfect for small nonprofit teams.

faq.question: What types of documents can we summarize?
faq.answer: All nonprofit materials: grant RFPs, funder guidelines, research studies, impact reports, donor annual reports, compliance documents, program evaluations, and more.

faq.question: How does it help with grant writing?
faq.answer: Quickly understand funder priorities, review past successful grants, and research program effectiveness to write stronger, evidence-based proposals.

faq.question: Is our donor data secure?
faq.answer: Yes! All documents are encrypted and private. We never share your data or use it for AI training. Perfect for protecting donor and beneficiary information.
